title: Disease
lyrics:
[Intro]
(Ah)
(Ah)
[Verse 1]
There are no more tears to cry
I heard you begging for life
Running out of medicine
You're worse than you've ever been
[Pre-Chorus]
(Ah-ah) Screaming for me, baby
(Ah-ah) Like you're gonna die
(Ah-ah) 
Poison on the inside
I could be your antidote tonight
(Ah-ah) Screaming for me, baby
(Ah-ah) Like you're gonna die
(Ah-ah) Poison on the inside
I could be your antidote tonight
[Chorus]
I could play the doctor, I can cure your disease
If you were a sinner, I could make you believe
Lay you down like one, two, three
Eyes roll back in ecstasy
I can smell your sickness, I can cure your (Cure)
Cure your disease

[Verse 2]
You're so tortured when you sleep
Plagued with all your memories
You reach out, and no one's there
Like a 
god without a prayer
[Pre-Chorus]
(Ah-ah) Screaming for me, baby
(Ah-ah) Like you're gonna die
(Ah-ah) Poison on the inside
I could be your antidote tonight
(Ah-ah) Screaming for me, baby
(Ah-ah) Like you're gonna die
(Ah-ah) Poison on the inside
I could be your antidote tonight
[Chorus]
I could play the doctor, I can cure your disease
If you were a sinner, I could make you believe
Lay you down like one, two, three
Eyes roll back in ecstasy
I can smell your sickness, I can cure your (Cure)
Cure your disease
[Post-Chorus]
(Ah)
(Ah) Cure your disease
(Ah)
I can smell your sickness, I can cure your—

[Chorus]
Bring me your desire, I can cure your disease
If you were a sinner, I could make you believe
Lay you down like one, two, three
Eyes roll back in ecstasy
I know all your secrets, I can cure your, oh
Cure your disease
[Post-Chorus]
(Ah) Cure your disease
(Ah) Cure your—
(Ah)
I can smell your sickness, I can cure your—
I can cure your disease
(Ah) Cure your disease
(Ah) Cure your disease
(Ah) Ooh
(Ah) Ooh
